question: You recently organized an all-day meeting for your company, which took place in a local hotel. In their feedback, participants at the meeting said that they liked the hotel, but they were unhappy about the food that was served for lunch. Write a letter to the manager of the hotel. In your letter,1- Say what the participants liked about the hotel2- Explain why they were unhappy about the food3- suggest what the manager should do to improve the food in future.
text: With regards to a full-day meeting which we organized at your prestigious hotel, I would like to thank you for your professional services and kind hospitality. As per our meeting participants, they loved the overall ambience of the hotel, the housekeeping, and the overall experience of spending time there. If there were not for your well-trained staff and formal arrangement, we would not have received such positive comments from our guests.

However, after having lunch during that meeting, a lot of our participants complained about the food. In particular, they did not like the taste, as lots of dishes did not seem fresh, and some of them were too spicy and oily. Resultingly, most of them could not eat to their full, and they had to resort to nearby restaurants afterwards to satisfy their appetite.

As the rest of our experience, including the quick service and conference room, was quite remarkable. We suggest that you shall pay more attention to the training of your chefs and other kitchen staff so we can book your hotel for our future meetings as well.
